title: The Seedling Stars
description: The Seedling Stars is a collection of science fiction short stories by James Blish. It was first published by Gnome Press in 1957 in an edition of 5000 copies. The stories all concern adapting humans to alien environments. The stories all originally appeared in the magazine Fantasy & Science Fiction, If, Super Science Stories & Galaxy Science Fiction.Contents:"Seeding Program" "The Thing in the Attic" "Surface Tension" "Watershed"
author: James Blish
